channel.title: Comments on: Running with Wolves
channel.description: Stellar Short Fiction by Women-Identified Writers Since 2010

item.title: By: Rochelle
item.dc:creator: Rochelle
item.description: "Sometimes as a reader, writer, and woman, I’ve felt lost." I feel for all of this. I feel all of this. Thank you for writing. That there is definitely a book I'll be checking out.
item.content:encoded: “Sometimes as a reader, writer, and woman, I’ve felt lost.” I feel for all of this. I feel all of this. Thank you for writing. That there is definitely a book I’ll be checking out.

item.title: By: Cathrin
item.dc:creator: Cathrin
item.description: Thanks for this, Phoebe. Women Who Run With the Wolves is a very important book. The first time I read it, I wept, frequently. I hope your article opens that door for other women. Great job!
item.content:encoded: Thanks for this, Phoebe. Women Who Run With the Wolves is a very important book. The first time I read it, I wept, frequently. I hope your article opens that door for other women. Great job!
